mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_tbl WHERE product_code = #{ productCode }

SELECT SUM(a.cart_cnt) AS total_cart_cnt FROM cart_tbl a JOIN member_tbl b ON a.member_code = b.member_code WHERE b.member_code = #{memberCode}
